statistics.title: statistics
statistics.wordsSpeedSubtitle: A word is considered to be 5 characters or more

speed.title: monkey mode
speed.subtitle: Words sprint
speed.description: Type random words as quick as possible, try to not make mistake !
speed.hugeDescription: Banana in hand, keyboard under your fingers, show that you're the fastest monkey! Ready to take up the challenge?

timer.title: bunny mode
timer.subtitle: Against the clock
timer.description: Time is running out ! how many words can you write in the time allowed?
timer.hugeDescription: With keyboard ready and watch in hand, prove you're the fastest rabbit! Challenge against the clock begun!
